byline.original: By IAN AUSTEN and LIAM STACK

abstract: British foreign secretary announces five people killed in whale-watching boat accident off coast of British Columbia were British.
lead_paragraph: The British foreign secretary confirmed the nationalities of those who died after a whale-watching boat sank.

headline.main: 5 Britons Die in Sinking Near Tofino, British Columbia
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | The Americas: Canada: Britons Die in Sinking of Whale-Watching Boat

snippet: The British foreign secretary confirmed the nationalities of those who died after a whale-watching boat sank.
